original_text: They will attack all your towns, everywhere in the land that the Lord your God has given to you. They will knock down the strong walls that you thought would keep you safe. They will make their camps around your towns until they can take the towns for themselves.
korean_text: 그들이 전국에서 네 모든 성읍을 에워싸고 네가 의뢰하는 높고 견고한 성벽을 다 헐며 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주시는 땅의 모든 성읍에서 너를 에워싸리니

sentences.original_text: They will attack all your towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너의 모든 성읍을 공격할 것이다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord your God has given to you
sentences.korean_translation: 네 주 하나님이 너에게 주신 땅에서

sentences.original_text: They will knock down the strong walls
that you thought would keep you safe
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 안전을 지켜줄 것이라고 생각했던 성벽들을

sentences.original_text: They will make their camps around your towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너의 성읍들 주변에 진지를 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: until they can take the towns for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 성읍들을 자신들을 위해 빼앗을 때까지
